lab.name: Rice on the Chessboard
lab.description: The purpose of this lab is to draw a 8X8 grid with various numbers in each cell.

resource.name: 8x8 Chessboard With Cell Number
resource.description: This generates a 8X8 HTML table with each cell containing the cell count.

resource.name: 8x8 Chessboard With Cell Squared
resource.description: This generates a 8X8 HTML table with each cell showing the number of squared.

resource.name: 8x8 Chessboard With Rice Grain Counts
resource.description: This generates a 8X8 HTML table with each cell showing the of grains of rice on the square.

resource.name: 8x8 Chessboard In SVG
resource.description: This generates a 8X8 HTML using SVG.
